docs.title: How to Create a Product in Ordeez: A Step-by-Step Guide
docs.text: Unlock the potential of your Ordeez store by effortlessly adding products to captivate your customers. Follow this detailed guide to create a product with ease and precision:

docs.title: 1. Access the Dashboard and Initiate Product Creation
docs.text:
• Sign in to your Ordeez account to access the dashboard.
  • Navigate to the left-hand menu and select Products.
  • Click the Create Product button to begin.

📸 Create Product Button:

docs.title: 2. Enter Product Details
docs.text:
• You’re now on the product details page. Start by entering a compelling product name. For this example, let’s use "Cardano - Italian Shoes" to highlight an elegant footwear line.
  • Provide a detailed description to entice customers, emphasizing quality and style.

📸 Product Name - SKU - Product Type (Physical/Digital) - Description - Upload Images up to 3: 📸 Pricing - Inventory - Add Tags - Delete Product: 📸 Product Display (Storefront): 📸 Choosing Product (Add To Cart):

docs.title: 3. Configure Variants, Options, and Visibility
docs.text:
• Enhance your product by adding variants and options, such as colors (e.g., black, Brown) and sizes (e.g., 40, 41, 42).
  • Adjust the Visibility settings: Make it Visible to publish now or Hidden until ready.

📸 Visibility (Public/Hidden): 📸 Product Variants: Let's Choose a Name (Black Color) - Variant SKU - Variant Price - Inventory - Image: 📸 For the (Sizes) Add Option => Name it Sizes - Add Choice for each Size - Add each Size Inventory: 📸 Product Variant Display (Add to Cart): 📸 Another Example with Out-of-Stock Inventory (Just Put on Choice Inventory 0):

docs.title: 4. Assign a Category
docs.text:
• Every product needs at least one category.
  • Choose an existing category or create a new one. For this example: Create a category called "Classic" and select it.

📸 Add New Category:

docs.title: 5. Set Pricing Details
docs.text:
• Enter the original price and a discounted price to attract buyers.
  • For example: Original Price: $175 Discounted Price: $120

📸 How to Make Discount: 📸 Discount Display:

docs.title: 6. Save and Publish
docs.text:
• Once all fields are completed, click the Save button in the right bottom corner.
  • Your "Italian Shoes" are now live on your Ordeez store, ready for customers to explore via WhatsApp!

🎉 You're done!

docs.title: Setting Up Your Store
docs.text:
Here’s how to set up your Ordeez store.

Go to ordeez.ai Click Sign Up

📸 Log in or Sign up your Ordeez Acoount

Fill in your store info

📸 Name your store, choose your industry, write a short description of your business, and create a custom store link to share with your customers

📸 Upload your logo to represent your brand, and optionally add a cover image to personalize your store page

📸 Set up your contact and payment information so customers can reach you easily via WhatsApp and pay you in your local currency

📸 Connect your social presence to build trust and let customers reach you on their favorite platforms

From the dashboard, click on the Settings section in the left menu, then select Store to edit your store information

📸 To update your store details, go to Settings from the left menu, then choose Store

📸 Fill in your full store address to help customers locate you easily and ensure accurate delivery and location info

📸 Set your store's tax rate and provide your VAT registration number for invoicing and compliance purposes

📸 Set your store's weekly operating schedule. Customers can see "Open" or "Closed" status

Don’t forget to hit the Save button at the bottom right—once saved, your store is live and ready to welcome customers 🎊
